metadata.title: CVE-2014-2553 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Open Ticket Request System(OTRS) 3.1.x before 3.1.21, 3.2.x before 3.2.16, and 3.3.x before 3.3.6allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTMLvia vectors related to dynamic fields.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
